7in-X8-6S-2806.5-1300kv/1700kv-Shikijo-C.preset_note: Emu tune for X8 cinelifter with 7inch prop. Working with 1300 to 1700kv 2806.5 motors. If you want more smooth : try dynamic rate like 10 weight to center, if you want more lock : increase the P to 2 on Roll and Pitch. You need to soft mount your FC with correct bumper, unless you need to decrease P and D to 5 point on each axis.
7in-X8-6S-2806.5-1300kv/1700kv-Shikijo-C.__comment: !!! Filters Gyro !!! type: 0=PT1, 1=BiQuad; ON for nonHelio, OFF for Helio

7in-4S/6S-2806-1300/1700kv-Skylion-frees.preset_note: 7in Glide. Base tune not meant to be perfect Mainly for 7in, but tested on 6in 4s and 7in 4&6S
7in-4S/6S-2806-1300/1700kv-Skylion-frees.__comment: !!! Filters Gyro !!! type: 0=PT1, 1=BiQuad; ON for nonHelio, OFF for Helio

6in-6S-2507-1700kv-Feisar-Freestyle.preset_note: Tune for 6inch freestyle builds with True-X or squished frames. 8k/8k Gyro and PID loop. DYNAMIC_FILTER ON with Matrix filter notch Q at 250 and Matrix filter notch min at 120
6in-6S-2507-1700kv-Feisar-Freestyle.build_props: Ethix K2 6x4x2 or HQProp DP 6x4x3 V1S
6in-6S-2507-1700kv-Feisar-Freestyle.__comment: !!! Filters Gyro !!! type: 0=PT1, 1=BiQuad; ON for nonHelio, OFF for Helio

6in-4S-2408-1900kv-Skylion-Freestyle.preset_note: Good for 6in freestyle/cinematic quads for 6s lower p's&d's by 5ish

5in-6S-2207-1750kV-Andrey-freestyle.preset_note:
Tune suitable for powerfull 6S motors with lightweight props.
Should be run with 32khz OFF and 4k/4k Gyro and PID loop

5in-6S-2207.5-1900kv-BOMBA-Freestyle.preset_note: Adjust D value to fit your quad if needed. Enjoy
5in-6S-2207.5-1900kv-BOMBA-Freestyle.__comment: !!! Filters Gyro !!! type: 0=PT1, 1=BiQuad; ON for nonHelio, OFF for Helio

5in-4S-2207-2750kV-BlackBird & Shlangy-s.preset_note: Should be run with 32khz ON and 32k/16k Gyro and PID loop

5in-4S-2306-2750kv-Filthrillz Stella.preset_note: Good for 5in Freestyle quads for 4s only

5in-4S-2207-2550-Pierre-Meunier-SmoothJu.preset_note: Preset smooth PID for 4S 5inch Freestyle quad, it should be compatible with most setup with strong motors

5in-4S-2305-2550kv-Pierre-Meunier-HighTu.preset_note: Preset high PID for 4S 5inch Freestyle quad, it might not be compatible with your setup watch motor temp

5in-4S/6S-2306-2450/1800kv-Skylion-Cinem.preset_note: Softer 5in tune for cinematic/6s freestyle. Based on my main 5in settings tested on FPVCycle cineglide and I had a friend test 6S for me
5in-4S/6S-2306-2450/1800kv-Skylion-Cinem.__comment: !!! Filters Gyro !!! type: 0=PT1, 1=BiQuad; ON for nonHelio, OFF for Helio

5in-4S-2306-2450kv-Skylion-freestyle.preset_note: My Main 5in 32khz tune. Exactly my main 5in aliens settings, only difference is I left the gyro/dterm lpfs alone, on Helio/Strixf10 you can turn them off if your build is clean enough
5in-4S-2306-2450kv-Skylion-freestyle.build_frame: Impulse RC Alien, FPVCycle deadcat glide lite
5in-4S-2306-2450kv-Skylion-freestyle.__comment: !!! Filters Gyro !!! type: 0=PT1, 1=BiQuad; ON for nonHelio, OFF for Helio

5in-Tune-From-Scratch.preset_note: Use this preset to tune your quad from scratch.  It sets low PIDs along with TPA, SPA, SDS, WC and Boosts OFF. It sets gyro LPF1=90, gyro LPF2=off, dTerm LPF1=100, dTerm LPF2=250. Tune all your own settings from here.

3in/4in-4S-1407/2204kv-3800/3000kv-Skyli.preset_note: 3/4in powerbuilds. Tested on both a 3in 1407 4200kv toothfairy and 4in 2204 3050kv floss
3in/4in-4S-1407/2204kv-3800/3000kv-Skyli.__comment: !!! Filters Gyro !!! type: 0=PT1, 1=BiQuad; ON for nonHelio, OFF for Helio

3in-3S-1303-5000kv-Skylion-freestyle.preset_note: FPVCycle TP3 spec build. For TP3 builds 115g and less. Tested with TP3HD.
3in-3S-1303-5000kv-Skylion-freestyle.__comment: !!! Filters Gyro !!! type: 0=PT1, 1=BiQuad; ON for nonHelio, OFF for Helio

3in-4S-1506/2203-3600/3450kv-Skylion-Cin.preset_note: Any Cinewhoop preset. Made with FPVCycle Cinesplore also tested on ShenDrones Squirt and Geyser
3in-4S-1506/2203-3600/3450kv-Skylion-Cin.__comment: !!! Filters Gyro !!! type: 0=PT1, 1=BiQuad; ON for nonHelio, OFF for Helio

3in-1S-1202.5-11500kv-Skylion-Freestyle.preset_note: Babytooth/Savagebee. Created with a spec fpvcycle babytooth but it should be good on any 1s 2.5-3in ultralite build
3in-1S-1202.5-11500kv-Skylion-Freestyle.__comment: !!! Filters Gyro !!! type: 0=PT1, 1=BiQuad; ON for nonHelio, OFF for Helio

2.5in-ToothPick-2S-1103-7000KV-Pierre-Me.build_frame: Larva X and Skip HD , 2.5 and 3 inches

2.5in-2S-1202-8000kv-toothpick-Skylion-f.preset_note: 2.5in Toothpick under 75g auw. For 2s 2.5in under 75g all up or 3in 2s under 85g all up with 8000kv motors
2.5in-2S-1202-8000kv-toothpick-Skylion-f.__comment: !!! Filters Gyro !!! type: 0=PT1, 1=BiQuad; ON for nonHelio, OFF for Helio

1in/2in-1S-0802-16k18k20k22k-Skylion-fly.preset_note: 65/75mm tinywhoop/nanoquad 31mm,35mm,&40mm props, also open prop frames 31mm-55mm. tested on beta 1s and hummingbirdf4pro 18k,20k,&22k motors
1in/2in-1S-0802-16k18k20k22k-Skylion-fly.__comment: !!! Filters Gyro !!! type: 0=PT1, 1=BiQuad; ON for nonHelio, OFF for Helio

1in-1S-0802-19000kv-3Dracingman-NanoHawk.preset_note: EMax NanoHawk without propeller guards using 35mm HQ tri-props
1in-1S-0802-19000kv-3Dracingman-NanoHawk.__comment: !!! Filters Gyro !!! type: 0=PT1, 1=BiQuad; ON for nonHelio, OFF for Helio

Default-with-low-dTermLPFs.preset_note: This preset has lower dTerm LPFs, with LPF1 at 65 and LPF2 at 200. Possibly over-filtered, but should be safer for motor heat.  Be aware that both over-filtering or under-filtering (Gyro and dTerm) can lead to motor heat.

Default-with-high-dTermLPFs.preset_note: This default has higher dTerm LPFs, with LPF1 at 100 and LPF2 at 250.  Please be cautious of motor heat.  Both over-filtering or under-filtering (Gyro and dTerm) can lead to motor heat.
